text: 15.45: Stt 2.7; Zo 6.33; 6.39-40; 6.54; 6.63; 2 Ko 3.4-6; 3.17; Fi 3.21Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, “Fhe Bakɨme fharav guma ga muuŋgiap bɨɨŋbɨɨn ana nɨɨŋgi, mba guma zɨ Adam.” Mba zɨ guarara hɨgi Adam, ana Krais ma. Fhe Bakɨme zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ gumgi ga ndɨɨi Ŋina anan ki. Ana vhɨra zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨn wo gumgir nɨɨŋgirga tuktɨgi.
